apps.name: Hubitat Alexa Routine Trigger
apps.description: Manager app that creates Alexa-friendly trigger devices and trigger groups.

drivers.name: Hubitat Alexa Routine Trigger - Virtual Contact Trigger
drivers.description: Virtual contact sensor optimized for Alexa routines, with auto-reset and debounce/cooldown behavior.

drivers.name: Hubitat Alexa Routine Trigger - Child Contact
drivers.description: Contact endpoint device created as a child of the app for use as discrete Alexa routine triggers.

drivers.name: Hubitat Alexa Routine Trigger - MultiTrigger Controller
drivers.description: Controller device used in Hubitat automations to fire a group of child contact triggers exposed to Alexa.
